CustomField.description: Concatenated text of Account info for Quote
CustomField.formula: SBQQ__Account__r.Name & BR() & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingStreet & " " & BR() & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingCity & ", " & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingState & " " & BR() & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingPostalCode & " " & BR() & SBQQ__Account__r.Phone
CustomField.label: AccountInfo
